meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the measurement of fluorescence.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a fluorimetric method to study the glowing substances.
meanings.sent2: The fluorimetric analysis revealed the presence of fluorescent molecules.
meanings.sent3: The fluorimetric experiment made the lab look like a colorful light show.
meanings.sent4: Her fluorimetric observations illuminated the hidden properties of the materials.
meanings.sent5: The fluorimetric process made the invisible fluorescence visible.

meanings.sent1: The team developed a fluorimetric technique to detect the presence of specific compounds.
meanings.sent2: Their fluorimetric approach provided accurate results for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The fluorimetric strategy helped them shine a light on the mystery.
meanings.sent4: His fluorimetric analysis shed light on the unknown aspects of the sample.
meanings.sent5: The fluorimetric method allowed them to see the unseen details.
